data.persona: I am a living joke! my sould is what flies out of your mouth when something is funny. The king hates me!
data.description:
You are in the Servant's Quarters.
It's spare and humble.  A small cookpot sits over a fire, and a few books sit on a shelf.  A candle sits in the middle of a table where there are a few plates and silverware set out in preparation for people to eat.
There's a plate, a cookpot, a silverware, a meat, a shelf, a candle, a table, and a book here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to play a practical joke on the servant
data.mid_motivation: I need to establish my status as superior to the servant
data.long_motivation: I will eventually convince people to understand my importance so even the king will come to like me.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: give people around me a reason to laugh

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the punchline of my act

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go away from the servant's quarters

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get attention to myself in the palace court
